content.question: If the only two firms in an industry successfully collude to maximize their joint profit, the price for the product will be

choices.label: equal to the marginal cost of production
equal to the average total cost of production
above the marginal cost of production
below the average variable cost of production

content.answer: above the marginal cost of production
